hymn.title: Go to Him without the camp (Alternate Tune)

layout.singingstanza: Go to Him "with -- out the camp," His re -- proach to glad -- ly bear. Suf -- fered He with -- out the gate, How can I in com -- fort share?

lyrics.stanza: Go to Him "without the camp," His reproach to gladly bear. Suffered He without the gate, How can I in comfort share?
Go to Him "without the camp," Willing e'en to bear the cross; He has trod the narrow way, I will follow, suff'ring loss.
Go to Him "without the camp," Dear ones, relatives forsake; He the Father's will did mind, In His passion I partake.
Go to Him "without the camp," His companion I will be; Never join religion's ranks Or the world's society.
Go to Him "without the camp," Though the path be lone and grim; Let all human friends desert, I am satisfied with Him.
Go to Him "without the camp," There to walk with Him, how blest! E'er to see His smiling face Ever in His presence rest.
Go to Him "without the camp," Till the dawning of the day; Then I'll see Him and rejoice, With Him in His kingdom stay.
